column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Bosscat is 5 Stars! I walked in late night without a reservation and still got seated!!! I had a Mai Tai and a Long Island (I'd say get the LIIT) and the drinks were stiff! Had the Catfish
column3: and the Blueberry Pie!!! Catfish was some mid. Wings was hitting. Blueberry buttermilk pie was top tier! Ima be back w a reservation next time.
